GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: post a comment for an article which should include property author and property body both in string

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of commets for a specific article with a descending order of created_at

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
